A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi was a truly beautiful film\, not just in the cinematography but also in the story and how far Rian Johnson is willing to push the limits of a beloved franchise. Rian takes the religion of the Jedi and the power of the Force and uses compelling story and narrative to turn it into something more\, a balance between good and evil. After seeing a rehash of A New Hope in The Force Awakens\, it definitely is satisfying\, and heartwarming\, to get an all new Star Wars film.
